column4: "Advocate for student interest to state & local officials & raise awareness of civic issues on campus. Plans Gripe Night, Voter Registration, & Aggie Ice Cream Day on the Hill."
"We are an organization designed to bring like minded students of all areas who are interested in politics and furthering the democratic party."

"USU-DSA strives to bring like-minded people together by learning and organizing political action, with the goal to create open good-faith conversations about socialism and how it fits in our modern world. To build a community of leaders and active citizens, we create various outlets for members to be able to participate in the political process."

"USUSA Students United for Reproductive Freedom (SURF) works to involve students to become more empowered in their reproductive health choices and local government. We seek to educate students and promote reproductive rights and health while also being involved in the local community. "
